item.title: 8 Seasalt.ai Cloud Happy Hours This Summer: Failures and Successes
item.description: Seasalt.ai, a Conversational AI consulting startup, is built during the COVID-19 pandemic: we hired the first employee in March 2020 and most team members have never met each face to face.
